attributes.review: i literally JUST downloaded the app today. i was looking through it and then all of a sudden highway to heaven by nct 127 started playing and it literally POSSESSED my dogs and cats!! they got up on their back paws and started dancing to it! but the worse part is: the app starting to mix way v’s love talk into it and then nct dream’s ridin, nct u’s boss, super m’s jopping, super junior’s black suit, twice’s more and more, red velvets russian roulette, exo’s ko ko bop, and stray kids’ hellevator!!! i got so scared to the point that i thought i might throw up! my family and i just stared, they were each dancing to each song!!! even my house joined in on the dancing! along with pluto!!! this is NOT a good app trump. i’m VERY disappointed in you. i was already disappointed that you were the united state’s president but NOW you need to stop. this joke of yours has gone WAY too far and you need to stop RIGHT NOW. i am definitely voting Kim Namjoon for president! you should be ashamed of yourself.
attributes.title: stanloona127

attributes.review: first of all, trump is not someone i would be very fond of seeing. he is a terrible person who kills innocent people and locks CHILDREN in CAGES and sends them into HUMAN TRAFFICKING. HOW WOULD YOU FEEL IF YOUR INNOCENT CHILD WAS LOCKED IN A CAGE LIKE YOUR PET AND SENT INTO SEX TRAFFICKING?? i would be pretty furious if i was stripped of my rights for my race and my children forced into cages for me to possibly never see them again. THEN he cant even control a pandemic correctly when obama was able to treat ebola as quick as it came. now look at everything that is happening, he’s not helping black people or anyone of color. he lets them get killed and tortured everyday. he’s like the hitler to people of color. put yourself in a poc’s shoes and live as one of us for a day, experience the terrible lives we have to go through because of all this racism towards us and our families. while trump sits here and watched while mocking us. thank you for your time.
attributes.title: i don’t know how to feel

attributes.review: First thing I do is open up the app and the second I’m in I just..I just see all my other apps have been deleted??? and I was rlly confused by that, I didn’t think the trump app was the reason??????🤔🤔🤔🤔 It was rlly weird ig but then more weird things started happening the next day. I went on the app and I wake up TO MY SKIN TURNING ORANGE!!!!!!!!!!😱😱😱😓😓😓😡😡😡. That’s when I thought Oh no something is happening, something is wrong. So I went to the doctor overseas to get a checkup 😱😱😱😱 and the Doctor told me i had trump disorder!!! I only had a few more days to live 😨😨😨😨😰😰😰😰😰😫😫😫😫 I was so scared and conflicted by everything that was going on. Then after that more things started happening, my vision was turning orange!!!!! 😱😱😱😱😭😭😭😭 and thats when I knew my life was already ruined and all THANKS TO THIS APP, I give this app a ONE STAR RATING, please don’t get this app, your health is NOT worth risking it 💖💖💖💖💯💯💯 Thank you!!!😝😝😝
attributes.title: Worst. App. The worst I’ve ever seen.

attributes.review: Today, I was really busy squealing about anime boys and my many husbandos..However, when I went into my discord to talk to my fellow fetuses about our lord and savior Sebastian Michaelis, the app suddenly transferred to this app where my eyes witnessed the most horrifying thing this world could have brought into existence. I’ve never felt such pain looking at an ugly Cheeto, my discomfort grew to level 100. 💀 suddenly, I felt a pain in my head and passed out from the toxic exposure. They had to rush me to the hospital as I was feeling so sick, I could barely think. When the doctor took my blood test, he sighed at me and then I was taken to the ER where they scanned me. After that I went home. When I went back, they told me I had gotten a brain tumor and that I needed surgery. When the tumor was removed, I could no longer see. They had to take my sight in order to save me-now I have no vision. This app is the worst :( it caused the biggest sad in me.. :(
attributes.title: Not good. 😭😭

attributes.review: I downloaded the app to learn more about our savior Donald J Trump. When I opened the app they asked me very personal questions such as how long my left pinkie is and when was the last time I got a haircut. Ok.... Continuing on, I was immediately forced to input my address and credit card information. Within 5 minutes of submitting my address, there was a knock at the door. An orange looking troll stood at my front door. He told me he was here to sell tickets to his next convention. When I politely declined he forced himself in and grabbed a few hundred dollars in cash and handed me a ticket with his tiny tiny hands. Looking back at the app it was littered with pictures of the orange troll that was at my door. I had nightmares of the scary troll that night and immediately deleted the app the next morning. My therapist told me to talk my feelings out through this review but every time I close my eyes all I see are his itty bitty cheeto crusted hands.
attributes.title: Extremely Disappointed

attributes.review: i downloaded this app to support our amazing oompa loompa of a president but when i opened it a large scary orange creature popped up on the screen!!!! 😱 i screamed and dropped my phone into my bowl of chili that i cooked in my crockpot 😢the bowl then dropped onto the floor and broke in half!! 😭my tiny dog then came over to eat the chili but ended up eating a piece of the bowl 😡 i had to take him to the vet to get the piece out and it cost me THOUSANDS of dollars!! 😫 when i came home my phone was completely cracked and covered with chili but GUESS WHAT. that horrendous creature was still on the screen! i looked closely and saw that it was the OOMPA LOOMPA PRESIDENT!!!!! 😧 so i did the only thing that any sane person would do...i SMASHED IT INTO THOUSANDS OF TINY PIECES. so then i had to order a NEW iphone 11 🙄🙄 but obviously i had the money because i am a WHITE conservative woman!! so now i’m going to be leaving this HORRIBLE review because i absolutely HATE this app!! anyways 🖤💛🖤💛🖤💛 MANNY FOR PRESIDENT!!!!
attributes.title: i HATE this app 🤬😔😛

Gen z is not going down without a fight. This is also the worst app it the world. Apple plz shut this crap down. Like damb Donald Trump is so dumb. Do what’s best for us isn’t that waist a good president does??!! I’m not wasting my time on you or your dumb actions! #shuttrumpdown2020
attributes.title: Gen Z will rule

attributes.review:
First of, trump supporters are saying that we, Gen z cant and won’t make a change in our society, we are a revolution and you all boomers, gen x, and everything else, y’all with remember us for centuries. And also kids have opinions that there parents and you can’t take away. I am one of those kids. My parents won’t vote for him cause of what he is doing to our country, and also Hilary had more votes than him out of our people in this country but trump got more federal votes. So do all of gen z a favor and shut up before you try to bring us down, we will never back down from bullying our president with fairy emojis🧚🏿‍♀️🧚🏾‍♂️🧚🏽🧚🏼‍♀️🧚🏻‍♂️. Hope all trump supporters and trump burn in hell. Including my grandma who thinks it’s ok to call African Americans “slaves” or “poor black people” when she has 6 African American grandchildren. Bye bye trump!

             Trump 2020🖕🏿🖕🏾🖕🏽🖕🏼🖕🏻 but in a coffin getting buried in his grave🧚🏽🧚🏻‍♂️🧚🏼‍♀️🤗☺️😊😈😈😈😈
attributes.title: Ban trump

attributes.review: My pet fish downloaded this app for me and it was terrible. The phone started flashing and before I knew it the fish was flopping around the room with a knife in one hand chanting the word ‘Trump’. Now I don’t know who or what this ‘Trump’ is but it rhymes with ‘Dump’ so I assumed my fish just pronounced it wrong (poor thing is still learning English) When I corrected it, however, it’s little fish eyes turned red and it proceeded to murder my cat and chase me around the house too!! I was too scared to call the police (after all, they’ll probably say my fish just thought my cats food was a gun and let the fish go without punishment). Needless to say, the fish ended up killing my husband and kids. I am now hiding from it in the closet and have moments left to live, so I’ve chosen my final moments to be spent writing this review. Rip husband, kids, and cat. Oh, and could someone PLEASE figure out why my poor fish can’t pronounce Dump? Would be much appreciated.
attributes.title: Stay safe guys!!!!

attributes.review: This app glitches so much my presidents face gets all distorted to the point he looks mutated! I crave to see his orange face and corn silk hair every morning. My love for him is far above anyone else’s, but this app doesn’t do him justice at all! This app glitches so bad I’m starting to think it’s run by those terrorist blue haired commies that claim to “hex” me. Magic isn’t real haha but THIS APP IS STARTING TO PROVE OTHERWISE. I FEAR FOR MY PRESIDENT. He is what brings me joy. Of course, Jesus first, but my idol is Donald J. Trump. I may be a woman so I of course will never amount to what this man has done, because I am biologically inferior to him. But I will bear children that will soon run under his greatness. I’ll even name them after Donald, so when they present themselves to the pristine president. I’m tired of all this fake news on twitter and Tic Tac! Why wouldn’t I believe this app is also fake news! I may only be 14 years old, but my faith and my heart says that Donald J. Trump deserves more than this app. ✨🧚🏿👯‍♀️💃
attributes.title: Trash!
